Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 020240 PPR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition of one (1) city-owned property, located on the westerly side of Veterans Road West, south of Englewood Avenue, Borough of Staten Island, in Council District no. 51.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP,  Veterans Road West, Staten Island (C020240PPR)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020243 ZSR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 51 to allow group  parking facilities acessory to commercial uses in a general large scale development.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Special Permit CD# 51, Staten Island (20020243ZSR)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020236 ZSR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 51 to allow the development of a large retails establishment (Use Group 6 and 10A).  This action is subject to review and actions by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
